casebody.data:
UNITED STATES, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Irving ZAFRIN and Irving Kremer, Defendants-Appellants. No. 246. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 10, 1938. Maxwell Shapiro, of New York City, for appellants. Harold St. L. O. Dougherty, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn (Vine H. Smith, of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges,

PER CURIAM.

Judgment, 22 F.Supp. 601, affirmed in open court.
